name: Clicker adventure (V22)
description:
This is a special clicker with mechanics that you have already seen by the type of dodge

Your goal is to destroy the robots and then the boss. Along the way, buying improvements.

To control you will need a mouse and a space bar

MANUAL:

1) The eye

He moves in different directions and attacks you to dodge, press the space bar 3 times, has 20 HP

2) An old friend

He attacks with a splash of energy from the core, has 35 hp.

3) The spider

teleport things out of your pockets and it teleport around the room, it also attacks you. To dodge, press the space bar 3 times. Has 15 hp

4) Boss

RUN

SCRIPT:

3 thieves broke into your house, divided your portal gun into 3 parts and stole it, you need to defeat the boss and take what belongs to you.
